Country Manager - TurkeyPosition Title:             Country ManagerEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                         up to 220K TRY, all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications Job Location:            Istanbul, TurkeyAbout the Client:A prominent group with international collaboration and a successful track of record in providing co-working spaces solutions Job Description:Streamline internal processes and workflows to enhance operational efficiency and implement best practices as standard.
Act as a trusted advisor to clients, understanding their business needs and providing tailored solutions to maintain long-term client relationships and satisfaction.
Oversee the financial performance of the consultancy, including budget, financial analysis, and reporting. Monitor and manage key financial indicators, such as revenue, expenses, and profitability.
Stay abreast of market industry trends, dynamics, and competitor activities to identify emerging business opportunities and make informed recommendations.
Oversee multiple consulting projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery, quality, and adherence to client requirements.Skills
Skills:
Open to Turkish nationals
28 to 44 years old
Minimum 5 years’ experience in the same role
Must be available to join by October 2023
